docs.title: DVR Smart Edit
docs.text: DVR Smart Edit - an open source DaVinci Resolve plugin to automate and streamline your editing workflow.

docs.title: 🚀 Main Features
docs.text:
• UniText+: Text+ generation, Text+ styles copy, import or export subtitles.
  • Effect Control: Select and apply effects from your presets base on keywords.

docs.title: 🎥 Video Guide
docs.text: A step-by-step video guide for using the plugin will be available soon. Stay tuned! (YouTube video placeholder)

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: Follow the steps below to install DVR Smart Edit using your preferred method:

docs.title: Install from Release Page
docs.text:
This method is recommended for most users.

  1. Download the Installer:
    • Visit the Release Page on GitHub.
    • Download the latest version of the archive containing install.py.
  1. Drag and Drop:
    • Open DaVinci Resolve and navigate to the Console:
      • Access it via Workspace > Console.
    • Drag the install.py file from the archive into the DaVinci Resolve Console.
  1. Follow Instructions:
    • The script will automatically set up the plugin for you.
    • Restart DaVinci Resolve

docs.title: Install via Pip (Python Users)
docs.text:
This method is suitable for users who are familiar with Python.

  1. Open your terminal or command prompt.
  2. Run the following command:
pip install dvr_smart_edit
Install the Development Version
